Description:
Find out about the new features in .NET 10 Preview 7 across the .NET runtime, SDK, libraries, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, C#, .NET MAUI, and more!

The post [.NET 10 Preview 7 is now available!](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/dotnet-10-preview-7/) appeared first on [.NET Blog](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet).
Title: .NET 10 Preview 7 is now available!
EnhancedContent:
Today, we are excited to announce the **seventh** preview release of .NET 10 with enhancements across the .NET Runtime, SDK, libraries, C#, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, .NET MAUI, and more. Check out the full release notes linked below and get started today.

[Download .NET 10 Preview 7](https://get.dot.net/10)

This release contains the following improvements.

## **üìöLibraries**

- [Launch Windows processes in new process group](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/libraries.md#launch-windows-processes-in-new-process-group)
- [AES KeyWrap with Padding (IETF RFC 5649)](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/libraries.md#aes-keywrap-with-padding-ietf-rfc-5649)
- [ML-DSA](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/libraries.md#ml-dsa)
- [Composite ML-DSA](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/libraries.md#composite-ml-dsa)
- [PipeReader support for JSON serializer](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/libraries.md#pipereader-support-for-json-serializer)
- [WebSocketStream](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/libraries.md#websocketstream)
- [TLS 1.3 for macOS (client)](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/libraries.md#tls-13-for-macos-client)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/libraries.md)

## **‚è±Ô∏èRuntime**

- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/runtime.md)

## **üõ†Ô∏è SDK**

- [Use the `any`
RuntimeIdentifier with platform-specific .NET Tools](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/sdk.md#any-rid-in-multi-rid-tools)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/sdk.md)

## **C#**

This preview release does not contain new C# features.

- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/csharp.md)

## **F#**

This preview release does not contain new F# features.

- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/fsharp.md)

## **Visual Basic**

This preview release does not contain new Visual Basic features.

- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/visualbasic.md)

## **üåê ASP.NET Core & Blazor**

- [Configure suppressing exception handler diagnostics](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/aspnetcore.md#configure-suppressing-exception-handler-diagnostics)
- [Avoid cookie login redirects for known API endpoints](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/aspnetcore.md#avoid-cookie-login-redirects-for-known-api-endpoints)
- [Passkey authentication improvements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/aspnetcore.md#passkey-authentication-improvements)
- [Support for the .localhost top-level domain](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/aspnetcore.md#support-for-the-localhost-top-level-domain)
- [Use PipeReader support in System.Text.Json](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/aspnetcore.md#use-pipereader-support-in-systemtextjson)
- [Enhanced validation for classes and records](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/aspnetcore.md#enhanced-validation-for-classes-and-records)
- [Blazor improvements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/aspnetcore.md#blazor-improvements)
- [OpenAPI.NET dependency upgraded to stable release](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/aspnetcore.md#openapinet-dependency-upgraded-to-stable-release)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/aspnetcore.md)

## **üì± .NET MAUI**

- [XAML Source Generator](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/dotnetmaui.md#xaml-source-generator)
- [MediaPicker EXIF Support](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/dotnetmaui.md#mediapicker-exif-support)
- [SafeArea Enhancements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/dotnetmaui.md#safearea-enhancements)
- [Secondary Toolbar Items](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/dotnetmaui.md#secondary-toolbar-items)
- [New Control APIs](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/dotnetmaui.md#new-control-apis)
- [Deprecated API Removals](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/dotnetmaui.md#deprecated-api-removals)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/dotnetmaui.md)
- Full list of quality improvements on [dotnet/maui GitHub releases](https://github.com/dotnet/maui/releases/).

## **üñ•Ô∏è Windows Forms**

- [ComboBox Dark Mode Rendering Fix](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/winforms.md#combobox-dark-mode-rendering-fix)
- [RichTextBox Dark Mode Improvement and Known Limitation](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/winforms.md#richtextbox-dark-mode-improvement-and-known-limitation)
- [PropertyGrid Dark Mode Enhancements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/winforms.md#propertygrid-dark-mode-enhancements)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/winforms.md)

## **üñ•Ô∏è Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF)**

- [Bug Fixes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/wpf.md#bug-fixes)
- [Fluent Theme Improvements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/wpf.md#fluent-theme-improvements)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/wpf.md)

## **üéÅ Entity Framework Core**

- [Improved translation for parameterized collection](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/efcore.md#improved-translation-for-parameterized-collection)
- [Small improvements and bug fixes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/efcore.md#small-improvements-and-bug-fixes)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/efcore.md)

## **üì¶ Container Images**

- [`dnx`
is now on the `PATH` in SDK images](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/containers.md#dnx-is-now-on-the-path-in-sdk-images)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/preview/preview7/containers.md)

## üöÄ Get started

To get started with .NET 10, [install the .NET 10 SDK](https://get.dot.net/10).

If you‚Äôre on Windows using Visual Studio, we recommend installing the latest [Visual Studio 2022 preview](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/vs/preview/), which now includes [GitHub Copilot agent mode and MCP server support](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/agent-mode-has-arrived-in-preview-for-visual-studio/). You can also use Visual Studio Code and the [C# Dev Kit](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-dotnettools.csdevkit) extension with .NET 10.

## üì¶ Join a .NET community standup

Join us each week and engage with the developers and product managers behind .NET for [community standups](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/live/community-standup).

## üì¢ .NET 10 Discussions

The team has been making [monthly announcements](https://aka.ms/dotnet/10/preview7) alongside full [release notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/tree/dotnet10-p7/release-notes/10.0) on the [dotnet/core GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/dotnet/core/discussions/categories/news) and has seen great engagement and feedback from the community.

## üîî Stay up-to-date with .NET 10

You can stay up-to-date with all the features of .NET 10 with:

- [What‚Äôs new in .NET 10](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/whats-new/dotnet-10/overview)
- [What‚Äôs new in C# 14](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/csharp/whats-new/csharp-14)
- [What‚Äôs new in .NET MAUI](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/maui/whats-new/dotnet-10)
- [What‚Äôs new in ASP.NET Core](https://learn.microsoft.com/aspnet/core/release-notes/aspnetcore-10.0)
- [What‚Äôs new in Entity Framework Core](https://learn.microsoft.com/ef/core/what-is-new/ef-core-10.0/whatsnew)
- [What‚Äôs new in Windows Forms](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/desktop/winforms/whats-new/net100)
- [What‚Äôs new in WPF](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/desktop/wpf/whats-new/net100)
- [Breaking Changes in .NET 10](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/compatibility/10.0)
- [.NET 10 Releases](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/10.0/README.md)

Additionally, be sure to subscribe to the GitHub Discussions [RSS news feed](https://github.com/dotnet/core/discussions/categories/news.atom) for all release announcements.

We want your feedback, so head over to the [.NET 10 Preview 7 GitHub Discussion](https://aka.ms/dotnet/10/preview7) to discuss features and give feedback for this release.
Author: .NET Team
